# HUD::SET_BLIP_AS_MINIMAL_ON_EDGE

## Summary
Set blip to go small when on edge of minimap

## Parameters
* **BLIP_INDEX** blip
* **BOOL** minimiseOnEdge

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Makes a blip go small when off the minimap.
